Player History
Drafted in 55th round, 874th overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2015...
Released by Brooklyn on 3/2/2017...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 3/2/2017 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2018, off Robert Percival (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/11/2018, off Jeffrey Ash (HOU)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Chicago on 5/23/2019...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Seattle on 6/26/2019...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New York on 8/10/2019...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2019...
Injured on 5/21/2020 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against Seattle on 8/23/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2020, hitting .538 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2020...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,700,000 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 7 runs against Boston on 4/30/2021...
